definition[0]: to remember or think about someone or something when you are doing something
example[0]: It’s a good idea – I’ll keep it in mind.
example[1]: You must always keep the reader in mind when writing a report.
example[2]: Floor tiles can be difficult to clean – worth keeping in mind when you choose a new floor.
example[3]: More money should be given to housing, bearing in mind (=because of) the problem of homelessness.
example[4]: Bear in mind that the price does not include flights.
